mapper.select: SELECT SUM(HIT) AS HIT, DT FROM HITTABLE WHERE DT BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 7, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 7, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY DT ORDER BY DT

SELECT DT, TITLE, MAX(HIT) AS HIT, CASE WHEN ID = 'S' THEN '쇼핑' WHEN id = 's' THEN '쇼핑' WHEN id = 'c' THEN '클래스' WHEN id = 'C' THEN '클래스' WHEN id = 'FREE' THEN '게시판' ELSE ' ' END AS ID FROM HITTABLE GROUP BY ID, DT, TITLE ORDER BY DT
SELECT DT, SUM(HIT) AS HIT FROM HITTABLE GROUP BY DT ORDER BY DT
